page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: I rise at 08.00, go and get washed, dress and have my breakfast. I set off for school at 08.30 from my home in Jubilee Road, Carlisle. I walk to school and usually arrive at 08.50. We start school at 09.00 and after assembly we have Maths and English. Playtime is at 10.30 and lasts for quarter of an hour. Dinner is at noon and we have a cafeteria type meal with a choice. There is a playtime in the afternoon and we finish school at 3.45 p.m. In the evening I go to Guides until 9.00 p.m. When I get home I play records and watch television. After that my dad takes me to the chipshop to buy my supper.
